page_content: Discusses a Contact Tracing App for Covid-19 management in the Kanton Aargau.
Discusses guidelines for public video surveillance in the Kanton Aargau.
Discusses EasyTax, a new software for filling out tax forms in Kanton Aargau.
Discusses the use of Augmented Reality in various projects for process optimization and visual communication.
Discusses the Integrales Management System (IMS) for accessing various documents related to civil engineering and territorial planning.
